016
017package org.parboiled.matchers;
018
019import static org.parboiled.common.Preconditions.*;
020import org.parboiled.MatcherContext;
021import org.parboiled.Rule;
022import org.parboiled.matchervisitors.MatcherVisitor;
023
024import java.util.List;
025
026/**
027 * Special wrapping matcher that performs memoization of the last mismatch of the wrapped sub rule.
028 */
029public class MemoMismatchesMatcher implements Matcher {
030    private final Matcher inner;
031
032    public MemoMismatchesMatcher(Rule inner) {
033        this.inner = checkArgNotNull((Matcher) inner, "inner");
034    }
035
036    @SuppressWarnings({"unchecked"})
037    public <V> boolean match(MatcherContext<V> context) {
038        if (context.hasMismatched()) {
039            return false;
040        }
041        if (inner.match(context)) {
042            return true;
043        }
044        context.memoizeMismatch();
045        return false;
046    }
047
048    // GraphNode
049
050    public List<Matcher> getChildren() {
051        return inner.getChildren();
052    }
053
054    // Rule
055
056    public Rule label(String label) {
057        return new MemoMismatchesMatcher(inner.label(label));
058    }
059
060    public Rule suppressNode() {
061        return new MemoMismatchesMatcher(inner.suppressNode());
062    }
063
064    public Rule suppressSubnodes() {
065        return new MemoMismatchesMatcher(inner.suppressSubnodes());
066    }
067
068    public Rule skipNode() {
069        return new MemoMismatchesMatcher(inner.skipNode());
070    }
071
072    public Rule memoMismatches() {
073        return this; // already done
074    }
075
076    // Matcher
077
078    public String getLabel() {return inner.getLabel();}
079
080    public boolean hasCustomLabel() {return inner.hasCustomLabel();}
081
082    public boolean isNodeSuppressed() {return inner.isNodeSuppressed();}
083
084    public boolean areSubnodesSuppressed() {return inner.areSubnodesSuppressed();}
085
086    public boolean isNodeSkipped() {return inner.isNodeSkipped();}
087
088    public boolean areMismatchesMemoed() { return true; }
089
090    public void setTag(Object tagObject) { inner.setTag(tagObject); }
091
092    public Object getTag() { return inner.getTag(); }
093
094    public MatcherContext getSubContext(MatcherContext context) {
095        MatcherContext subContext = inner.getSubContext(context);
096        subContext.setMatcher(this); // we need to inject ourselves here otherwise we get cut out
097        return subContext;
098    }
099
100    public <R> R accept(MatcherVisitor<R> visitor) {
101        checkArgNotNull(visitor, "visitor");
102        return inner.accept(visitor);
103    }
104
105    @Override
106    public String toString() { return inner.toString(); }
107
108    /**
109     * Retrieves the innermost Matcher that is not a MemoMismatchesMatcher.
110     *
111     * @param matcher the matcher to unwrap
112     * @return the given instance if it is not a MemoMismatchesMatcher, otherwise the innermost Matcher
113     */
114    public static Matcher unwrap(Matcher matcher) {
115        if (matcher instanceof MemoMismatchesMatcher) {
116            MemoMismatchesMatcher memoMismatchesMatcher = (MemoMismatchesMatcher) matcher;
117            return unwrap(memoMismatchesMatcher.inner);
118        }
119        return matcher;
120    }
121}
